text: <@U0265G76F|iamewald> has joined the channel
Hey there <#C028L147V>. Sorry for the weekend question. I’m busy updating the Uncorked site today. Just published KPCC (yah!) and had a couple, hopefully, minor questions —

1) When I published, our homepage threw a warning that the site was in spanish, asking if I wanted it to translate. I’ve not been able to recreate it since, but wanted to put it out there as a potential strange bug.

2) I’m hoping to have it displayed as one of our featured projects. Originally I thought that ‘display on homepage’ would automatically add it to the list, but that doesn’t seem to be the case. Any way we could remove Yopine and replace it with KPCC at the top of the list? I should note that I’m also going to be adding Zepp, and Vroom will launch shortly. The hope is to have each of those listed as featured products.
Hey David
hey there
1. I've tried it a few times and didn't get the Spanish message.
that’s great!
thank you for testing. I’ve not seen it since the initial 3 loads
i’m not overly concerned with that
2. I can't remember the reason for it but we decided no to make projects show on the home page automatically. I'll push an update later today to add this project.
gotcha
no hurry on it, i just didn’t know if that featured area was dynamic
OK
let’s wait to push an update until we have all these projects in place
i’m just now finishing up Zepp
<http://uncorkedstudios.com/work/zepp>

attachments.title: Uncorked Studios - Zepp
attachments.text: One of our driving interests at Uncorked Studios is the interaction between hardware and software, so when Zepp Labs approached us with their new, exceptionally sma

text: and we need approval on Vroom
but those are the three that we’ll be adding to the site pre-SF
Sounds good. Just say the word and I'll change that HTML.
awesome
thanks so much
happy saturday
